name: dev-server
instructions:
Starts the local development server with hot module replacement (HMR). The application will be available at http://localhost:5173

Prerequisites:
- Dependencies installed (npm install)
- .env file configured with STRATZ API token
- Hero portraits fetched (npm run fetch-heroes)

The server will:
- Watch for file changes and auto-reload
- Display build errors in the browser
- Enable React DevTools

Press Ctrl+C to stop the server.
